location: Near Caihong Bridge (Rainbow Bridge), Neihu riverside area
notes: Well-maintained upscale apartment with hardwood floors, recessed lighting, AC, and modern built-in cabinetry. Large living area with floor-to-ceiling balcony doors provides excellent natural light. For baby safety: balcony has horizontal railings that may need childproofing, glass coffee table has sharp corners. The unit appears clean with no stairs inside. Located near the Keelung River with views of the iconic Rainbow Bridge.
